New Yearly Swag Bag option (due to popular demand).
Support data from "Stryd Power" app on Garmin devices.
Prioritise Garmin, Suunto, Polar and TomTom services when refreshing workouts.
Include speed/pace values when sharing workouts to MovesCount.
Removed "swoosh" sound when sharing workouts.

You can now configure which types of workouts goes to the individual services with Auto Sharing. For example you can send only cycling workouts to Strava or just hiking and MTB workouts to Komoot.

User generated segments from Apple Watches running watchOS 5 finally works again.

Support power measurements from Garmin "Running Power"ConnectIQ app on compatible Garmin devices.

You can now configure which types of workouts goes to the individual services with Auto Sharing. For example you can send only cycling workouts to Strava or just hiking and MTB workouts to Komoot.

User generated segments from Apple Watches running watchOS 5 finally works again.

Support power measurements from Garmin "Running Power"ConnectIQ app on compatible Garmin devices.

You can now configure which types of workouts goes to the individual services with Auto Sharing. For example you can send only cycling workouts to Strava or just hiking and MTB workouts to Komoot.

User generated segments from Apple Watches running watchOS 5 finally works again.

Support power measurements from Garmin "Running Power"ConnectIQ app on compatible Garmin devices.

You can now configure which types of workouts goes to the individual services with Auto Sharing. For example you can send only cycling workouts to Strava or just hiking and MTB workouts to Komoot.

User generated segments from Apple Watches running watchOS 5 finally works again.

Support power measurements from Garmin "Running Power"ConnectIQ app on compatible Garmin devices.

New Background Refresh and Auto Sharing for unattended synchronisation between devices and services without having to open RunGap.

To enable background operation:

- Enable "Background Refresh" from "Accounts & Settings" to import workouts while RunGap is in the background (requires iOS 13)
- Disable ""Ask before sharing" from "Auto Sharing" to export new workouts while RunGap is in the background.

You will receive notifications when new workouts have been imported in the background.

This update also contains numerous other enhancements including the ability to abort lengthly operations with a cancel button in the progress bar at the bottom of the screen.

This update also contains numerous other enhancements including the ability to abort lengthly operations with a cancel button in the progress bar at the bottom of the screen.

- Removed Endomondo support (R.I.P.).
- Include more metrics such as energy and floors when sharing daily steps to Garmin Connect via "Labs".

- Added iFit support (import only).
- Disabled export to Suunto MovesCount (R.I.P.).
- Added "Stair Climbing" as a separate workout type.
- Numerous minor fixes and enhancements.

- Added support for Intervals.icu.
- Retired the “Friend Feed” as it is no longer supported by the majority of services or widely used.
- Removed the defunct “Polar Personal Trainer” now replaced by “Polar Flow”.
- Numerous stability and performance enhancements.
- Many minor bug fixes.

- Fixed issue importing workouts from Garmin Connect.
- Set title when uploading workouts to Komoot.
- Disable "elevation correction" when uploading to workouts to Garmin Connect.
- Only show used sources and types when configuring a filter.
- Minor fixes.

- Fixed issue importing workouts from Garmin Connect.
- Set title when uploading workouts to Komoot.
- Disable "elevation correction" when uploading to workouts to Garmin Connect.
- Only show used sources and types when configuring a filter.
- Minor fixes.

- Fixed issue importing workouts from Garmin Connect.

- Fixed issue importing workouts from Garmin Connect.
- Set title when uploading workouts to Komoot.
- Disable "elevation correction" when uploading to workouts to Garmin Connect.
- Only show used sources and types when configuring a filter.
- Minor fixes.

- Added new “Files” section to “Accounts & Settings”.
- Added many controls to tweak export of daily metrics to Garmin Connect from “Labs” (previously named “Export Steps”). Weight can now also be included.
- Display total elevation gain in lists when relevant and screen size permits.
- Added feature for bulk editing all workouts on a track.
- Recognise skate skiing workouts from Garmin Connect and treadmill runs from Strava.
- Read/write workout titles in FIT files in Wahoo Elemnt and Komoot compatible format.
- Multiple UI tweaks.
- Numerous fixes and enhancements.
